question.title: How to pull docker images from ECR in Testcontainers when using Podman
question.body:
Since switching to Podman from Docker for Mac, we can't pull images from ECR. Keep getting the error:

ContainerFetch Can't get Docker image: RemoteDockerImage(imageName=<imagename-from-ecr>

In spite of being able to perform podman pull <imagename-from-ecr> no problem.

I confirmed the auths are configured in ~/.config/containers/auth.json
